Hen begins to reflect on her professional progress as a firefighter while she thinks back on the times she was first introduced to Chimney and Athena.

First responders deal with holiday emergencies such as a toy store stampede, a chaotic mistletoe stunt and competitive neighbors in a Christmas-light showdown; Bobby rethinks his and Athena's future; Chimney and Buck try to help cheer Maddie up.

The First Responders come together in preparation to find a missing Maddie.

An emergency arises during a bank manager's special going-away party; the first responders encounter a mystery when they are blamed for a risky heist.

Bobby Nash decides to move to Los Angeles in the hopes of restarting his life after a devastating tragedy that struck his family back in Minnesota, but in Los Angeles, he first meets Athena Grant and works his way to captain of the 118.

Chaos ensues at a chocolate factory in the wake of a mail bomb explosion; Eddie learns unexpected news from Shannon; Maddie thinks about what her future at the call center may look like; tragedy befalls those at the 118.

The first responders race to three different scenes across the city, including a car accident and a high-rise fire drill that went awry; Bobby is given startling news from Buck; Eddie helps Christopher face the aftermath of the tsunami.

The 118 responds to two urgent situations that involve protestors at a slaughterhouse and a wife who is trapped inside a room with her husband's mistress; Athena acts with Harry, May and Michael suffer a traumatic experience during a traffic stop.
